Tamer79.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s role in [PAWN_possessive] tribe was to connect with the natural world around - especially the world of animals. In addition to fulfilling a spiritual role, [PAWN_pronoun] also tamed wild beasts and cared for them as they served the tribe.

Taster16.title: дегустатор
Taster16.desc: As the taster for a medieval king, any dish served at the royal table had to be sampled first by [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] lived a decadent lifestyle at court, getting fat and doing very little work.

Taxonomist0.title: таксономіст
Taxonomist0.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled between star systems, studying and classifying the plant and animal life [PAWN_pronoun] found in the hopes of creating a complete catalogue.

Teacher20.title: вчитель
Teacher20.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was educated in the liberal arts and taught at a public school. [PAWN_pronoun] was widely knowledgeable and well-liked by [PAWN_possessive] students.

TechEnthusiast28.title: технік-ентузіаст
TechEnthusiast28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had all the latest gadgets as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] spent all [PAWN_possessive] time playing games with AIs instead of with other children. [PAWN_pronoun] always felt awkward around new people.

TechHead8.title: технар
TechHead8.desc: Standing on the ship hull with [PAWN_possessive] father in an child-size EVA suit, [PAWN_nameDef] loved space from a young age.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was put in a Civil Academics Program. While pretending to be like [PAWN_possessive] father, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time taking care of plants in [PAWN_possessive] messy room. [PAWN_possessive] nickname was given for [PAWN_possessive] love of circles.

TechnicalKid1.title: technical kid
TechnicalKid1.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved nothing more then to forget the world around [PAWN_objective] and focus on the task at hand.

Technician9.title: технік
Technician9.desc: As an IT technician, [PAWN_nameDef] didn't have much time to write code any more.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] got called to work all the time to fix failures in the cryptosleep chamber and AI persuasion systems.

TechnologyDoctor35.title: technology doctor
TechnologyDoctor35.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed research into propulsive fuels and energy generation.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] loved technology research, and hoped to improve human life by doing it.

TechScholar75.title: tech scholar
TechScholar75.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a youth scholar of the world of science and technology.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] strived every day to expand [PAWN_possessive] intellectual abilities.

TestSubject15.title: піддослідний
TestSubject15.desc: У найбільш корумпованих міських світах, вчені без моральних обмежень здійснюють неймовірні злодіяння в ім'я досліджень. [PAWN_nameDef] was kept alone in a sealed facility from birth and subjected to a variety of behavioural experiments in an attempt to turn [PAWN_objective] into a perfect super-soldier.

TestSubject39.title: піддослідний
TestSubject39.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] enrolled in a scientific study that promised it could make [PAWN_objective] smarter. Unfortunately, the side effects were very different than [PAWN_pronoun] expected.[PAWN_pronoun] went insane and killed a number of people before escaping.

TestSubject82.title: піддослідний
TestSubject82.desc: Test subject #11,529,914 of experiment #56,048 spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood in white rooms performing mental and physical tests.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] only companion was a voice that called itself Mother. Mother rewarded success with praise - and failure with harsh punishment.

TestSubject90.title: піддослідний
TestSubject90.desc: Kidnapped as a teenager, [PAWN_nameDef] was an unwilling test subject in experimental gene therapies. Labs and scientists scare [PAWN_objective].

TestSubject92.title: піддослідний
TestSubject92.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s tests went from geometry to quantum physics, and [PAWN_pronoun] could run the grand gauntlet without a scratch.\n\nOne day, Mother said that [PAWN_possessive] final test lay beyond the red door, and that even if [PAWN_pronoun] couldn't hear her voice, Mother would always be there.

TheaterTechnician80.title: theater technician
TheaterTechnician80.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent countless hours behind the scenes of a famous theater. [PAWN_pronoun] built scenery, programmed lights, and monitored the machines that moved the sets.\n\nOff duty, [PAWN_pronoun] would talk with the cast members. Navigating the social drama of the actors helped [PAWN_objective] learn how to communicate well and manipulate others.

Tinkerer11.title: механік
Tinkerer11.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] spare time creating things from [PAWN_possessive] imagination out of scrap metal and discarded machinery.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] created simple robots and small tools, for both for fun and for utility.

Tinkerer79.title: механік
Tinkerer79.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a scrap-heap of a planet - the garbage dump of other planets in the system. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to make new machines from the dead parts of old ones. With some friends, [PAWN_pronoun] eventually escaped on a salvaged and repaired ship.

Tinkerer86.title: механік
Tinkerer86.desc:
"Як це працює?

Чому воно рухається?

Можливо, якщо я підправлю це... упс, я сподіваюся, що стало краще... чи може я зламав його..."

ToasterRepairman22.title: toaster repairman
ToasterRepairman22.desc: Good with [PAWN_possessive] hands and passionate about technology, [PAWN_nameDef] aspired to invent gadgets and machines that would change [PAWN_possessive] home world forever.\n\nA few failed and occasionally disastrous creations later, [PAWN_pronoun] gave up on [PAWN_possessive] dream and took a job more befitting [PAWN_possessive] skill set.

ToolMechanic77.title: tool mechanic
ToolMechanic77.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a famous tool mechanic on a dusty rimworld.\n\nAfter [PAWN_possessive] firm closed due to scandal, [PAWN_pronoun] joined a tribe to survive, crafting fine knives and hammers, traveling, and dealing [PAWN_possessive] wares between settlements.

Torturer37.title: кат
Torturer37.desc: Working for a tyrannical dictator, [PAWN_nameDef] earned a reputation as an expert in 'persuasion.' Any prisoner who went down into the dungeons left with no secrets - and with [PAWN_nameDef]'s smile scarred permanently into their nightmares.

TournamentFighter28.title: tournament fighter
TournamentFighter28.desc: Motivated by the violence in [PAWN_possessive] environment, [PAWN_nameDef] studied martial arts, eventually signing up for an unarmed fighting tournament.\n\n Unlike [PAWN_possessive] opponents, [PAWN_nameDef] looked to the ancient warriors for guidance. [PAWN_pronoun] trained from dusk till dawn, perfecting [PAWN_possessive] skills.

ToxicChild96.title: toxic child
ToxicChild96.desc: Growing up on a an industrial planet, [PAWN_nameDef] started working in a chemical plant at age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left [PAWN_objective] mentally scarred.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

TradersChild62.title: traders' child
TradersChild62.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a family of nomadic traders, making a living from selling and buying goods on many worlds.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] learned the customs and methods of trade of many cultures by participating in [PAWN_possessive] parents' business.

TragicLoner87.title: tragic loner
TragicLoner87.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was involved in a traumatic accident that resulted in [PAWN_objective] killing [PAWN_possessive] own family.\n\nCast out from society, [PAWN_pronoun] was left with only [PAWN_possessive] animal companions and several engineering textbooks to keep [PAWN_objective] company.

TraineeAlchemist64.title: алхімік-стажер
TraineeAlchemist64.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a medieval world. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on [PAWN_possessive] planet.

TransferStudent10.title: переведений студент
TransferStudent10.desc: A midworld child, [PAWN_nameDef]'s wealthy parents sent [PAWN_objective] to a nearby glitterworld to receive a better education.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was a talented student. However, due to [PAWN_possessive] family's wealth, [PAWN_pronoun] never had to do dumb labor.

TraumatizedYouth87.title: traumatized youth
TraumatizedYouth87.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on a pleasant midworld.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] body purist mother fell sick with heart disease. In desperation, [PAWN_nameDef]'s father abducted innocent people and harvested their hearts. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was arrested, but the child remained scarred from the experience.

TreasureHunter82.title: мисливець за скарбами
TreasureHunter82.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] explored outlying rimworlds in hopes of finding rare treasures.

After succeeding in finding one legendary sculpture, [PAWN_pronoun] was betrayed by [PAWN_possessive] men. [PAWN_pronoun] survived their treasonous attack, but the sculpture was taken.

[PAWN_pronoun] created the Anvil Mercenary Company to help [PAWN_objective] seek revenge.

TreehouseBuilder86.title: treehouse builder
TreehouseBuilder86.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] built houses among, and sometimes suspended in, the trees for [PAWN_possessive] people to use while traveling or foraging. [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to best find and use wild plants, and how to fight off wild animals.

TribalThunderer45.title: племінний громовержець
TribalThunderer45.desc: Years ago, [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe stumbled upon an abandoned gun vault. Believing the weapons to be sacred gifts, the shaman would select a child born under superstitious circumstances and assign them the honour of bearing one to defend the village. [PAWN_nameDef] is such a child.

TribeChild40.title: дитя племені
TribeChild40.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a tribe, running around the village, moving with the muffalo herds, learning essential skills from [PAWN_possessive] parents.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] never learned to read and never saw a machine that wasn't an ancient ruin.

TurtleHerder41.title: turtle herder
TurtleHerder41.desc: Born to settler folk, [PAWN_nameDef]'s family had a beloved herd of turtles, who protected them by absorbing shots from raiders.\n\nAt a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] was entrusted with the turtles. [PAWN_pronoun] bred them, successfully - too successfully. The massive turtle herds consumed every food source and destroyed the local ecosystem.

Undertaker93.title: трунар
Undertaker93.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] roamed, offering grief assistance to those who've had a recent loss. While [PAWN_pronoun] never shied away from physical confrontation, [PAWN_pronoun] prefers to confront tough situations with a calm word.

UnethicalDoctor29.title: unethical doctor
UnethicalDoctor29.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a doctor to save lives and research medicine. [PAWN_pronoun] soon realized the only way to make progress on [PAWN_possessive] research was to perform experiments on human patients.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] often used patients for [PAWN_possessive] experiments - whether they were willing or not.

UnstableButcher31.title: unstable butcher
UnstableButcher31.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] began hearing voices. The animals were talking to [PAWN_objective], insulting him. [PAWN_pronoun] came to hate them, and eventually killed [PAWN_possessive] furry former friends. [PAWN_pronoun] started selling the meat just to get human interaction.

UnwantedSurvivor67.title: unwanted survivor
UnwantedSurvivor67.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s noble family did not want [PAWN_objective], but could not afford to be seen directly assassinating [PAWN_objective] either. They attempted to get [PAWN_objective] killed by assigning [PAWN_objective] dangerous training without proper protection at too young an age.\n\nAgainst all odds, [PAWN_nameDef] survived the jousting contests, horsewar matches, riverrun competitions and warzones. In the end, it only made [PAWN_objective] stronger.

UpperUrbworlder12.title: верхньо-урб-планетний житель
UpperUrbworlder12.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a privileged childhood on a major urbworld. Living in an apartment far above the dense poverty of the city, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time reading or drawing the cityscape [PAWN_pronoun] saw through [PAWN_possessive] window.

UprightDiplomat49.title: чесний дипломат
UprightDiplomat49.desc: As a diplomat, [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to deal with diplomatic tasks in the blood-soaked outer rim sectors.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] hoped to end the endless wars, until [PAWN_possessive] consularship, the St. Anthem, was attacked by a raider fleet.

UrbanLordling82.title: urban lordling
UrbanLordling82.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a royal house with a grand manor in a great city. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth in lessons on politics.\n\nWhenever [PAWN_pronoun] could, [PAWN_pronoun] would escape with [PAWN_possessive] friends to explore the half-built substructure of the metropolis.

UrbworldArmyBrat84.title: дебошир урб-планетарної армії
UrbworldArmyBrat84.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on an urbworld military base. [PAWN_pronoun] was too young to fight, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned to make [PAWN_objective]self useful in other ways.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] became familiar with guns and military equipment, but never really got in touch with the natural world.

UrbworldChild56.title: urbworld child
UrbworldChild56.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had an isolated upbringing on an urbworld. [PAWN_possessive] hatred of heights kept [PAWN_objective] indoors often, and made [PAWN_objective] an introverted child.\n\nWhen [PAWN_pronoun] did go out onto the catwalks of the city, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed playing war games, becoming proficient with various simulation weapons.

UrbworldCriminal6.title: urbworld criminal
UrbworldCriminal6.desc: Born into bad circumstance on an overpopulated urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] turned to small-time crime as a way to avoid starvation and hypothermia.\n\nRobbery and murder were daily activities for [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_nameDef] learned that surviving was winning.

UrbworldDrone32.title: urbworld drone
UrbworldDrone32.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a mindless construction drone on a massive urbworld. Though [PAWN_pronoun] is now freed from the brutal social experiments to which [PAWN_pronoun] was subjected, [PAWN_pronoun] remains incapable of creative thought and leadership.

UrbworldEnforcer11.title: urbworld enforcer
UrbworldEnforcer11.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an enforcer of law on an ancient urbworld.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] dealt with the worst of humanity, from protecting greedy urbworld nobility in their spire palaces to rooting out cannibal cults in the deepest reaches of the underground hive.

UrbworldEntrepreneur14.title: підприємець в урбанізованому світі
UrbworldEntrepreneur14.desc: In the urbworlds, most suffer. But someone has to run the corporations.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] learned the skills of the trade - greasing palms and technical analysis. [PAWN_pronoun] is a sociointellectual machine.

UrbworldHooligan12.title: хуліган урбанізованого світу
UrbworldHooligan12.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a dangerous urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly learned how to get [PAWN_possessive] daily meal - by crime. Such means left little to no space for cooking and growing activities.

UrbworldPimp93.title: urbworld pimp
UrbworldPimp93.desc: At first, [PAWN_nameDef] made a small profit from selling drugs. Then, [PAWN_pronoun] switched to selling women and made a fortune.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] developed great skills with [PAWN_possessive] fists. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned to fix up the injuries [PAWN_pronoun] inflicted on the girls.

UrbworldPolitican92.title: політик урбанізованого світу
UrbworldPolitican92.desc: Ні для кого не секрет, що головний той, хто приймає рішення в урбанізованому світі, є великі корпорації, проте хабарі то комусь треба давати. [PAWN_nameDef] was one such figurehead.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] learned how to manipulate the hopes and dreams of the people while living comfortably in a penthouse.

UrbworldRebel56.title: urbworld rebel
UrbworldRebel56.desc: Most of the people on [PAWN_nameDef]'s world gave up their individuality to join together in an online hivemind. [PAWN_nameDef] joined a rebel faction that rejected technology entirely.

UrbworldSergeant50.title: урб-планетний сержант
UrbworldSergeant50.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s passion for all things militaristic kept with [PAWN_objective] all the way to adulthood.\n\nAfter enrolling as a local policeman, [PAWN_pronoun] was soon promoted to sergeant.

UrbworldSexSlave25.title: урб-планетний секс-рабиня
UrbworldSexSlave25.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold into sexual slavery. Having been designed to be inhumanly attractive and too weak to rebel against [PAWN_possessive] masters, [PAWN_pronoun] was passed between dozens of owners and knew nothing of freedom.

UrbworldUrchin6.title: міський шибеник
UrbworldUrchin6.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the darkest slums of [PAWN_possessive] urban homeworld. Neglected by [PAWN_possessive] mother, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own, battling for every scrap of food [PAWN_pronoun] saw.\n\nEventually, as [PAWN_possessive] talents exceeded [PAWN_possessive] peers, [PAWN_pronoun] ascended from the depths to the surface streets and left [PAWN_possessive] mother behind.

UrbworldUrchin61.title: безпритульник урбанізованого світу
UrbworldUrchin61.desc: The urbworlds - ancient and deep industrial cityscapes bursting with humanity and poison. [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the dark, unwanted reaches of such a place. [PAWN_pronoun] had to fight for every scrap of food.

UrbworldUrchin90.title: безпритульник урбанізованого світу
UrbworldUrchin90.desc: Abandoned among the filthy concrete spires, [PAWN_nameDef] never knew [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_pronoun] never received formal education, and often resorted to doing menial labor in exchange for food. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] lied, cheated, and stole to survive.

Vagabond73.title: волоцюга
Vagabond73.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] awoke on a dangerous planet with no resources and few survival skills. [PAWN_pronoun] bounced between camps, doing whatever work needed to be done, just to see the sun rise once more.

VatgrownAssassin20.title: вбивця з пробірки
VatgrownAssassin20.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was not made as a man, but a cold hearted assassin. [PAWN_pronoun] was bio-engineered by scientists, and trained as a killer. [PAWN_pronoun] was bred to have no emotion, no feelings, and no care for who lives, and who dies.

VatgrownMedic53.title: досвідчений медик
VatgrownMedic53.desc: Raised to be a combat medic, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in firearms as well as medicine. [PAWN_possessive] favorite phrase when coming upon a wounded soldier was, "Life or death?" Most chose life.

VatgrownScientist91.title: досвідчений вчений
VatgrownScientist91.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was grown to be a perfect scientist, with a mind perfectly tuned for physics and chemistry.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] creators used [PAWN_objective] as a teaching aid on mind design, hoping [PAWN_pronoun] would eventually grow to be a great mind and continue their research.

VatgrownSlavegirl8.title: доросла рабиня
VatgrownSlavegirl8.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, [PAWN_pronoun] was taught only to cook, clean and serve [PAWN_possessive] masters. For most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood, [PAWN_pronoun] knew nothing else.

VatgrownSoldier8.title: солдат-клон
VatgrownSoldier8.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as an instrument of destruction. Grown in a bioweapons facility and taught combat during [PAWN_possessive] accelerated growth, [PAWN_nameDef] still has a proclivity for combat of all kinds and an aversion to human contact.

VengefulChild43.title: дух помсти
VengefulChild43.desc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] returned to [PAWN_possessive] village to find that it had been wiped out by bandits. [PAWN_pronoun] swore revenge on the attackers and began a violent rampage across the wilderness.

VengefulExplorer54.title: мстивий мандрівник
VengefulExplorer54.desc: A violent drifter without a home, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] father fought many battles across hundreds of years. [PAWN_pronoun] became a grizzled fighter and crack shot.\n\nAfter [PAWN_possessive] father's death in battle, [PAWN_nameDef] began exploring the stars alone, seeking [PAWN_possessive] father's killer, on the hunt for revenge.

VengefulHunter32.title: мстивий мисливець
VengefulHunter32.desc: Following the death of a close friend by animal attack, [PAWN_nameDef] hunted the beast responsible. [PAWN_pronoun] tracked it to a nearby village, only to find one of the villagers wearing its pelt.

VengefulNomad67.title: мстливий кочівник
VengefulNomad67.desc: After refusing the wild demands of a tyrannical king, [PAWN_nameDef]'s nomad band was marked as an outlaw group and systematically hunted.\n\n [PAWN_nameDef]'s family was eventually captured. Those who weren't killed were taken as slaves. Sold to the owner of a manufactory, [PAWN_nameDef] swore that one day [PAWN_pronoun] would have [PAWN_possessive] revenge.

VersatileWorker13.title: різнороб
VersatileWorker13.desc: Spending [PAWN_possessive] later teenage years in a colony of settlers, [PAWN_pronoun] offered what little skills [PAWN_pronoun] had to anyone who would take him.\n\nBeing a quick learner, [PAWN_pronoun] honed many of [PAWN_possessive] skills and, apart from [PAWN_possessive] crippling inability to understand fire, is now a fully functioning adult.

Veterinarian99.title: ветеринар
Veterinarian99.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] treated sick and injured animals for a living. Seeing their suffering affected [PAWN_possessive] stance on the practice of eating meat, and for many years [PAWN_pronoun] lived as a vegetarian.

VideoGamer16.title: відео геймер
VideoGamer16.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a midworld, mostly locked in [PAWN_possessive] room, playing video games. [PAWN_pronoun] was warm-hearted, with a deep fondness for animals.\n\nAs [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, [PAWN_pronoun] turned to drugs to enhance [PAWN_possessive] reality. During these trying times [PAWN_pronoun] found passion and refuge in the gym.

VideoGamer55.title: відео геймер
VideoGamer55.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a glitterworld. Everything [PAWN_pronoun] wanted came to him. In school [PAWN_pronoun] was a social butterfly. At home, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time looking up the newest gadgets and playing [PAWN_possessive] favourite video games.

VideoProducer83.title: відеопродюсер
VideoProducer83.desc: Too awkward to socialize, [PAWN_nameDef] found comfort in the production of videos. Oddly, people enjoyed [PAWN_possessive] videos, calling them "perfect sitcom dramas".\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] took advantage of this and broadcast more, ever hopeful that [PAWN_pronoun] would be contacted by the Wizards.

VidtubeStar98.title: зірка Відтуба
VidtubeStar98.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s hobby was making videos for the popular video sharing service Vidtube. [PAWN_pronoun] made everything from video game reviews to pasta cooking guides.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] gained a over a million followers.

Villain89.title: лиходій
Villain89.desc: After rising to the top of [PAWN_possessive] criminal band, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught the arts of villainy, from handling firearms to developing new weapons technologies. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at bending others to [PAWN_possessive] will.

VinhoKing98.title: винний Король
VinhoKing98.desc: After prohibition came to Aracena VI, [PAWN_nameDef] expanded [PAWN_possessive] underground liquor business until it dominated the market on two continents. They called [PAWN_objective] the Vinho King.\n\nThough [PAWN_pronoun] mostly controlled [PAWN_possessive] competition by masterful political maneuvering, [PAWN_pronoun] was not above the occasional beat-down or stiletto assassination.

VoidRaider74.title: пустотний рейдер
VoidRaider74.desc: Craving adventure and glory, [PAWN_nameDef] set out across the void with a raider band, swearing [PAWN_possessive] loyalty to [PAWN_possessive] band and brothers, and spreading their glory through the stars with [PAWN_possessive] blade and pistol in hand.

VoidspaceRaider94.title: пірат пустки
VoidspaceRaider94.desc: After years of seeking the assassin that broke up [PAWN_possessive] family, [PAWN_nameDef] was offered a place with a group of space-faring raiders. [PAWN_pronoun] accepted, hoping to find the killer [PAWN_pronoun] sought.\n\nDue to [PAWN_possessive] seemingly-unending ability to narrowly escape danger, [PAWN_pronoun] earned the nickname 'Blackjack' in recognition of [PAWN_possessive] luck.

VoyagerChild94.title: мандрівна дитина
VoyagerChild94.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] [PAWN_gender ? виріс : виросла] на борту дослідницького зорельота і [PAWN_gender ? прожив : прожила] більшу частину свого дитинства, мандруючи скрізь порожнечу.\n\nНаближаючись до загадкового планетоїда, корабель отримав серйозні пошкодження. [PAWN_possessive] наступним спогадом є — корабель, що прямує з орбіти загадкової планети, повністю відремонтований. [PAWN_pronoun] незабаром [PAWN_gender ? виявив : виявила] у себе надприродний дар до технологічних досліджень.

VRAddict29.title: вР залежний
VRAddict29.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a VR head - someone who is permanently jacked into the virtual gaming universe by [PAWN_possessive] spinal plug. [PAWN_pronoun] moved through [PAWN_possessive] daily tasks barely aware of the physical reality around him. This left [PAWN_objective] nearly unable to socialize.

VRDesigner87.title: Дизайнер VR
VRDesigner87.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] розробив симуляцію віртуальної реальності для громадян блискучого світу. [PAWN_pronoun] приділяв велику увагу деталям світів [PAWN_possessive], зокрема вивчав усе [PAWN_pronoun] про життя рослин, щоб зробити ландшафти [PAWN_possessive] більш реалістичними.

WanderingCrafter42.title: мандрівний ремісник
WanderingCrafter42.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] продовжити стежити за кочовими методами [PAWN_possessive] батьків, підтримуючи [PAWN_objective]себе з [PAWN_possessive] навичками ремесла. But wandering is a hard life, and [PAWN_pronoun] often thought of finding somewhere to settle down and put [PAWN_possessive] skills to good use.

WanderingHealer52.title: мандрівний цілитель
WanderingHealer52.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] навчався на лікаря, але був незадоволений практикою [PAWN_possessive] у мирному середньому світі.\n\nНатомість [PAWN_pronoun] вирішив пустити коріння та подорожувати до крайніх світів, щоб піклуватися про людей, які потребували [PAWN_objective] більшість.

WarBastard60.title: військова мерзота
WarBastard60.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] народився через дев'ять місяців після того, як місто матері [PAWN_possessive] було завойовано ворожими солдатами. Дитина насильства без визнаного батька, [PAWN_nameDef] виросла в нижній частині соціальної піраміди.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] мати вселила свою гіркоту щодо чоловіків і війни в [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_possessive] домашній кролик дарував більше тепла, ніж будь-яка людина в житті [PAWN_possessive].

WarChief97.title: воєвода
WarChief97.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був ватажком племінної банди в зовнішньому світі. Для [PAWN_objective] поле бою — це гра, і немає нічого веселішого, ніж вогонь війни.

WarChild24.title: дитя війни
WarChild24.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] батьки брали участь в громадянській війні. Зростаючи в оточенні боротьби та смерті, [PAWN_pronoun] добре звик до трагедій. [PAWN_possessive] експресивна сторона, однак, ніколи не підтримувалась.

Warlordess56.title: воєначальник
Warlordess56.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був суворим лідером піратської групи.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] прийняв будь-який виклик, незалежно від того, наскільки він був жорстким або небезпечним. Інші називали [PAWN_objective] машиною для вбивства.

Warmaster54.title: воєначальник
Warmaster54.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був воєначальником знатного роду. [PAWN_pronoun] керував військові справами родини.\n\nУ рідкісних випадках, коли відбувалася битва, [PAWN_nameDef] керував військовими командирами.

Warmonger35.title: найманий воїн
Warmonger35.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] насолоджується кровопролиттям. Солдати, які служили з [PAWN_objective], боялися лютості [PAWN_possessive]. Вони рідко спілкувалися з [PAWN_nameDef], і [PAWN_pronoun] не проти ізоляції.

WarRefugee51.title: біженець війни
WarRefugee51.desc: У будинку [PAWN_nameDef] розпочалася війна, коли [PAWN_pronoun] був ще дитиною. Батьки [PAWN_possessive] бігли разом з [PAWN_objective] у пошуках безпеки, де б вони її не знайшли. Найраніші спогади [PAWN_nameDef] - про те, як його вчили захищати себе.\n\nНасильство та руйнування, свідком яких став [PAWN_pronoun], залишили шрами на все життя.

WarRefugee96.title: біженець війни
WarRefugee96.desc: На рідній планеті [PAWN_nameDef] почалася війна.\n\nЗібравши трохи їжі та речей, які могли, [PAWN_nameDef] і батько [PAWN_possessive] викрали корабель і втекли в космос.

Warrior73.title: воїн
Warrior73.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був героєм війни під час третьої світової війни планети [PAWN_possessive]. [PAWN_pronoun] допоміг запобігти запуску ядерної зброї під час особливо напруженого протистояння.

Warrior94.title: воїн
Warrior94.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був грізним воїном, який володіє багатьма видами зброї. [PAWN_pronoun] брав участь у багатьох битвах.

WarshipCaptain67.title: капітан військового корабля
WarshipCaptain67.desc: Роки командування на передовому корветі, [PAWN_nameDef] навчився мистецтву бути лідером, техніці вищої інженерії та тому, як зберігати спокій, поки вороги намагаються вбити вас.\n\nНа жаль, [PAWN_nameDef] дуже рідко спілкувався з природою.

WastelandWanderer81.title: мандрівник пустирями
WastelandWanderer81.desc: Народжений у багатій родині в пустельному світі, [PAWN_nameDef] був вигнаний після того, як загін найманців знищив батьківський дім [PAWN_possessive].\n\nХлопцю вдалося сховатися в охолоджувальному каналі під віллою [PAWN_possessive]. Поклявшись помститися вбивцям і тим, хто їх найняв, [PAWN_nameDef] вирушив на пустку сам.

WealthyStudent59.title: заможний студент
WealthyStudent59.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] народився в багатому осяйному світі. [PAWN_pronoun] навчався в Каспійській Інженерній школі та став успішним в математиці та комп’ютерному програмуванні.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] виріс у чистих, стерильних умовах. [PAWN_pronoun] ніколи не бачив ферми чи худоби.

Weaver63.title: ткач
Weaver63.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був експертом по перетворенню вовни, рослинних волокон та природних барвників у чудовий одяг родині [PAWN_possessive]. [PAWN_possessive] виробами часто торгували з іншими поселеннями.

WhiteHatHacker82.title: білий хакер
WhiteHatHacker82.desc: З комп’ютера [PAWN_possessive], [PAWN_nameDef] допоміг позбавити світ онлайну від поганців.

WildChild5.title: дика дитина
WildChild5.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був покинутий у токсичному світі, зарослому хижим рослинним світом. [PAWN_pronoun] рано звик до холодного дотику самотності.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] навчився битися, але їв [PAWN_possessive] їжу в сирому та сиров'яленому вигляді.

WildlifeRanger99.title: лісник дикої природи
WildlifeRanger99.desc: Розчарований браконьєрами, що довели до вимирання кілька видів тварин, [PAWN_nameDef] став захисником дикої природи. [PAWN_pronoun] доглядав і захищав тварин - силою, за необхідності.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] зненавидів людей, які забивали тварин заради розкоші та заради прибутку.

Winerunner8.title: винороб
Winerunner8.desc: Покинутий батьками [PAWN_possessive], [PAWN_nameDef] був вихований монахами монастиря Novo Mosteiro dos Jerónimos на Арасені VI.\n\nЧенці навчали [PAWN_objective] дисципліні та наполегливій праці. Натомість [PAWN_pronoun] ходив до міста і купував екзотичні вина для "нічних дегустацій" ченців.

WolfPackMember26.title: член вовчої зграї
WolfPackMember26.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] було викинуто родиною [PAWN_possessive]. Вихований вовками, [PAWN_pronoun] rбігав, полював і захищав зграю [PAWN_possessive].\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] навчився ефективно битися зубами і кігтями. [PAWN_pronoun] також вивчив дуже ефективні стратегії первісного полювання.

WorkCampSlave37.title: раб трудового табору
WorkCampSlave37.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] ріс як раб особливо неприємної дворянської родини на середньовічному світі. \n\nХоча [PAWN_pronoun] не отримав ніякої належної освіти, тяжка робота зробила тіло [PAWN_possessive] міцним.

WorldSlider42.title: слизька природа
WorldSlider42.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] вихований високомобільною бродячою бандою злочинців. [PAWN_pronoun] навчився не лишати доказів перебування [PAWN_possessive] на випадок, якщо групі доведеться поспіхом тікати. [PAWN_pronoun] також дізнався про медицину та рукопашний бій від [PAWN_possessive] товаришів-бандитів.

WreckageExplorer93.title: аварійно-рятувальний дослідник
WreckageExplorer93.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] було доручено спостерігати за стадами родини [PAWN_possessive], але часто ухилявся від обов'язку [PAWN_possessive], щоб досліджувати розбиті військові кораблі, розкидані по всій планеті.

YoungMaster23.title: молодий господар
YoungMaster23.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] народжений двома медиками, прагнув влади. [PAWN_possessive] гострий інтелект і харизма допомогли [PAWN_objective] здобути повагу однолітків [PAWN_possessive].\n\nВирішивши, що найкращий шлях здобути владу - піти до лав збройних сил імперії, [PAWN_pronoun] приєднався до них у наймолодшому віці.

YoungPirate71.title: молодий пірат
YoungPirate71.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] народився у піратів у брудній металевій кімнаті, яка пахла моторним маслом.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] не вчили, але [PAWN_pronoun] все ще навчився шляхам виживання, бартеру і бою.

YoungPsychologist58.title: молодий психолог
YoungPsychologist58.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] народився у бідному середньому світі, і виріс на передньому пасажирському сидінні таксі матері [PAWN_possessive].\n\nСлідкуючи за пішоходами та слухаючи пасажирів таксі цілими днями, [PAWN_pronoun] незабаром став майстерно з'ясувати справжнє призначення інших.

YouthDelinquent30.title: юний правопорушник
YouthDelinquent30.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був єдиною дитиною відомих сомельє. {PAWN_possessive} батьки очікували, що {PAWN_pronoun} займеться сімейною справою, але після {PAWN_possessive} третього вступу до центру тимчасового утримання неповнолітніх, цей кар'єрний шлях став малоймовірним.\n\nПеребуваючи під вартою, {PAWN_nameDef} набуває навичок виготовлення хвостовиків і цікавиться орнітологією.

YouthSoldier99.title: юний солдат
YouthSoldier99.desc: Народившись в сім'ї солдатів, [PAWN_nameDef] приєднався до програми військового тренування.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] досяг успіху у фізичному тренуванні й навіть пройшов більшу частину інтелектуальних іспитів. Хоча [PAWN_pronoun] ніколи не був особливо талановитим або спритним, [PAWN_nameDef] зрозумів цінність наполегливої праці та страждань.
